metroid-prime_.name: Metroid Prime
metroid-prime_.caption: This game does a great job of delivering narrative through the environment

prey_.name: Prey
prey_.caption: A fantastic homage to System Shock. I've just finished the main game and I'm excited to dive into the Mooncrash expansion

ghost-in-the-shell_.name: Ghost in the Shell
ghost-in-the-shell_.caption: Don't be misled by the tactical lingerie - it's actually a fantastic sci-fi about AI and the concept of "self"
